info.name: † Tumblr Cursive Banner/Header & Wiccan Pentacle †
info.description:
Replaces Tumblr's banner/header with a cursive design and a pentacle.
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
Previously known as unholymaster, my last account was banned, so I'm reposting all of my styles.
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
HD Preview
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.2 Change Log: 08/05/2016 // Reposted on new account. 01/09/2016 // Minor improvements to image. 14/09/2016 // Changed width to suit better with the original banner. 26/07/2017 // Tidied up coding and updated credit to new username. Font used: Lavanderia
